CharacterDao.insert_query: INSERT INTO Character (id, name, attack_power, health_points, speed, hate_value, price, weapon, energy, avaliable_location, hate_matrix) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
CharacterDao.update_query:
UPDATE Character SET 
        name = ?, attack_power = ?, health_points = ?, speed = ?, hate_value = ?, price = ?, weapon = ?, energy = ?, avaliable_location = ?, hate_matrix = ? WHERE id = ?;

FetterDao.insert_query: INSERT INTO Fetter (id, numofpeople, description) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
FetterDao.update_query:
UPDATE Fetter SET 
        description = ? WHERE id = ? AND numofpeople = ?;

CharacterFetterDao.update_query:
UPDATE CharacterFetter SET 
         WHERE character_id = ? AND fetter_id = ?;
